features.name: Customer Management
features.description: Manage customer information, search customers, view customer history and statistics

features.name: Order Management

features.name: Menu Management
features.description: Manage menu items, categories, pricing, availability, and product options

features.name: Product Options
features.description: Manage product extras including vlees, bijgerecht, sauzen, and garnering options with dynamic pricing

features.name: Shopping Cart
features.description: Shopping cart functionality with quantity management, product options display, and total calculation

features.name: Authentication & Authorization
features.description: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control (Admin, Kassa, Public)

features.name: Delivery Management
features.description: Manage delivery drivers (koeriers), assign orders to couriers, and track delivery status

features.name: Order History
features.description: View order history, search and filter orders, view order details

features.name: Reporting & Analytics
features.description: Generate daily, monthly, and Z-reports with product statistics, hourly breakdowns, and revenue tracking

features.name: Inventory Management
features.description: Track ingredients, stock levels, recipes, and inventory transactions

features.name: Receipt Generation & Printing
features.description: Generate receipts with ESC/POS formatting, QR codes, and print to thermal printers (Windows) or print queue

features.name: Backup & Restore
features.description: Backup and restore database functionality

features.name: Online Orders
features.description: Handle online orders from public website

features.name: Pickup Orders
features.description: Manage pickup/afhaal orders

features.name: Real-time Updates
features.description: WebSocket support for real-time order updates, status changes, and admin dashboard sync

features.name: Admin Dashboard
features.description: Admin interface for managing orders, menu, reports, and settings with real-time updates

features.name: Kassa Interface
features.description: Point of sale interface for placing orders, customer search, product selection, and automatic printing

features.name: Public Customer Website

features.name: Settings Management
features.description: Manage application settings, printer configuration, and custom footer text

features.name: Contact & Address Management
features.description: Handle contact information and address validation with suggestions

features.name: Email Verification
features.description: Email verification functionality for customer accounts

features.name: Database Management
features.description: Database operations, initialization, and context management

features.name: UI Components

features.name: Logging & Configuration
